evidence.text: ORDER granting 21 Motion to Amend Scheduling Order. The parties are not required to serve initial disclosures. On or before November 3, 2023, in accordance with District of Maine Local Rule 26, the parties may either file a notice of intent to file a motion for summary judgment and request a pre-filing conference or file a joint motion setting forth a proposed summary judgment briefing schedule. By MAGISTRATE JUDGE JOHN C. NIVISON. (NIVISON, JOHN) (Entered: 06/27/2023)

By MAGISTRATE JUDGE JOHN C. NIVISON. (NIVISON, JOHN) (Entered: 06/27/2023)

evidence.text: ORDER granting 32 Motion to Exceed Page Limits. The parties' request to exceed the page limit in Local Rule 7(d) is GRANTED. The parties may file motions for summary judgment and supporting memoranda not to exceed 35 pages. By JUDGE NANCY TORRESEN. (slg) (Entered: 11/06/2023)
